title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6170.6 - Implementation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6170.6 - Implementation

State Regulations
(a) The
commissioner of the Division of Criminal Justice Services and the chairman of
the Crime Victims Board shall assist criminal justice agencies in implementing
these standards. (b) Nothing herein
shall prevent a criminal justice agency from using the services of another
public or private agency to assist them in implementing these
standards. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6170.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
